name: Lorblets
description:
Lorblets is a simple puzzle game where the goal is to turn all of the lights on. The difficulty is that when you turn any light on/off, all lights adjacent to it will switch on/off as well.

Lorblets puzzles are randomly generated so you'll never run out. The puzzles will increase in difficulty as you progress. If you want to see a random puzzle, click the dice symbol at the bottom.
